titles.title: Supportive Services Enhancement Act
Supportive Services Enhancement Act
To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to update the definition of supportive services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Supportive Services Enhancement Act
This bill expands the definition of supportive services under the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to include mental health care, substance use disorder treatment, and affordable internet connection. It also requires local one-stop centers to provide such services to adults and dislocated workers.
